items.name: small first aid kit
descriptions: look:A small box with some gauze and medical tape.

items.name: large first aid kit
descriptions: look:A medium sized box with some gauze, medical tape, and disinfectant.

items.name: star wars band-aid
descriptions: look:A cute band-aid with a Chewbacca staring at you.
location:in a box in the cupboard

items.name: narnia bandaid
descriptions: look:A cute band-aid with a lion you vaguely recognize.
location:in a box in the cupboard

items.name: hitchhikers guide to the galaxy towel
descriptions: look:A somewhat yellow towel that you might be able to use to heal yourself

items.name: enders game bandaid
descriptions: look:A cute bandaid with a picture of a large space station on it
location:in a box in the cupboard

items.name: indiana jones bandaid
descriptions: look:A cute bandaid with a golden idle on it
location:in a box in the cupboard

items.name: rubber gloves
descriptions: look:Some protective, yellow, rubber gloves that could protect you hands from toxic items

items.name: space toilet
descriptions: look: It appears to be a regular toilet attached to a tube with extreme suction power.
